channel.title: Networking Basics
channel.description:
Hey, I've never used networking before. I want to know what is the best to use to learn the basics of networking. I'm not sure whether to us Java.net, Netty or Mina.
Thanks.

item.title: Networking Basics
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

considering you just made your first program a few days ago, networking is not the right step to take now. work with acquainting yourself with the language and make sure you understand all the basics of the language as well as understanding object orientation before even attempting networking.

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/networking/sockets/ is where to start when you’re comfortable with what you know

Read full topic

item.title: Networking Basics
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

actually Google would be the best place to learn the basics of networking.

Read full topic
